introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to StudioZen. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it, and what your rights are in relation to it.

dataWeCollect.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.content: We collect the following information to provide and improve our service:

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.content: When you register, we collect your name, email address, and encrypted password. If you sign in with Google, we receive your public profile information (name, email, profile picture).

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.content: We collect information about how you use our application, such as study sessions, summarized materials, and blocked sites. This data is associated with your account to provide you with app functionality.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to manage your authentication session and to remember your preferences, such as accepting the cookie banner.

points.provide: Provide, maintain, and improve the StudioZen application.
points.communicate: Communicate with you about service-related matters.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except for essential service providers (like Google's Firebase for hosting and authentication) who are bound by confidentiality obligations.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take reasonable security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can manage your account information directly from the application or by contacting us.

changes.title: 7. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please do not hesitate to contact us.

helpGuide.description: Learn how to make the most of StudioZen's features to improve your focus and learning.

summarizer.title: AI Summarizer
content: To summarize text, select the 'Text' tab, paste your material into the text area, choose a summary style (Paragraph, Bullet Points, or Key Concepts), and click 'Summarize'.
To summarize an image, select the 'Image' tab, upload a picture of your document, and click 'Summarize'. The AI will extract the text and provide a concise summary.

quizGenerator.title: Quiz Generator
quizGenerator.content: Turn your notes into an interactive quiz. Paste the text and click 'Generate Questions'. A list of questions will appear. Click on a question to see the multiple-choice options. Select an answer to get immediate feedback.

focusTimer.title: Focus Timer (Pomodoro)
focusTimer.content: Use the Pomodoro technique to maximize your productivity. Click 'Start' to begin a 25-minute study session. When the time is up, the timer will notify you and automatically start a 5-minute break.
